DataFlowName: Custom SQL Batch Information UAT [Geel] AU
Description: Custom Query to send batch information
SQL_Querry:
SELECT efs.Value BATCH_ID, 
 ef.Name PROCEDURE_NAME, 
   ef.StartTime AS START_DATE, 
 ef.EndTime AS END_DATE, 
 h.ElementID AS EQUIPMENT_ID, 
 h.Path AS EQUIPMENT_PATH, 
 h.Name AS EQUIPMENT_NAME, 
 h.Level AS EQUIPMENT_LEVEL 
 FROM 
 EventFrame.EventFrameTemplate eft 
 INNER JOIN EventFrame.EventFrame ef ON ef.EventFrameTemplateID = eft.ID 
 INNER JOIN EventFrame.EventFrameAttribute efa ON efa.EventFrameID = ef.ID 
 INNER JOIN Data.EventFrameSnapshot efs ON efs.EventFrameAttributeID = efa.ID 
 INNER JOIN Asset.ElementHierarchy h ON h.ElementID = ef.PrimaryReferencedElementID 
 WHERE 
 (ef.StartTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED] OR ef.EndTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED]) 
 AND efa.Name = 'Batch Name'
Message: Flow information has been updated successfully
UpdateSQql:
Update efs.Value BATCH_ID, 
 ef.Name PROCEDURE_NAME, 
   ef.StartTime AS START_DATE, 
 ef.EndTime AS END_DATE, 
 h.ElementID AS EQUIPMENT_ID, 
 h.Path AS EQUIPMENT_PATH, 
 h.Name AS EQUIPMENT_NAME, 
 h.Level AS EQUIPMENT_LEVEL 
 FROM 
 EventFrame.EventFrameTemplate eft 
 INNER JOIN EventFrame.EventFrame ef ON ef.EventFrameTemplateID = eft.ID 
 INNER JOIN EventFrame.EventFrameAttribute efa ON efa.EventFrameID = ef.ID 
 INNER JOIN Data.EventFrameSnapshot efs ON efs.EventFrameAttributeID = efa.ID 
 INNER JOIN Asset.ElementHierarchy h ON h.ElementID = ef.PrimaryReferencedElementID 
 WHERE 
 (ef.StartTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED] OR ef.EndTime BETWEEN [SD] AND [ED]) 
 AND efa.Name = 'Batch Name'
SQLQueryDS:
SELECT distinct 'VDR0'||area_name||'_'||char_value as ID 
 ,char_value as NAME 
 ,'/' as 'PATH' 
 ,1 as 'LEVEL' 
 FROM 
 'PRM_SQL'.'AspenBatch'.'dbo'.'char_batch_data' a 
, 'APRM_SQL'.'AspenBatch'.'dbo'.'characteristics' b 
, 'APRM_SQL'.'AspenBatch'.'dbo'.'batches' c 
 ,'APRM_SQL'.'AspenBatch'.'dbo'.'areas' d 
 ,'APRM_SQL'.'AspenBatch'.'dbo'.area_attribute_settings e 
 where attribute_name = 'ch_for_unit' 
 and a.char_id = b.char_id 
and a.batch_id = c.batch_id 
 and c.area_id = d.area_id 
 and e.area_id = d.area_id 
 and char_name = attribute_value
Message2: Data Source information has been saved successfully
DataFlowName2: Custom SQL Process Event UAT [Val-de-Reuil] AU
Description2: Custom Query to send Process Event
SQL_Querry2:
Select 
 BATCH_ID, 
 EQUIPMENT_ID, 
 EQUIPMENT_NAME, 
 EQUIPMENT_FULL, 
 EQUIPMENT_HIERARCHY_MII, 
 RECIPE_NAME, 
 RECIPE_FULL, 
  START_DATE, 
 ENDDATE, 
  PARAMETER_NAME, 
 PARAMETER_VALUE, 
 DATE_PARAMETRE AS PARAMETER_TS, 
 MATERIAL_ID, 
 PARAMETER_LL, 
 PARAMETER_HL, 
 PARAMETER_TARGET, 
 PARAMETER_FORMAT, 
 PARAMETER_UOM, 
 RECIPE_PATH, 
 CATEGORY, 
 EQUIPMENT_PATH, 
EventFrameTemplateName 
 from APRMStreaming ([SD], [ED]) order by start_date asc
DataDestination2: Sanofi UAT Data Lake for Process Events
Message3: Flow information has been updated successfully
